[Pratik](https://pratikb.com) is the founder and Director of Research at NCCS.
He is an interdisciplinary researcher with over a decade of experience and expertise in
cognitive neuroscience and psycholinguistics.
His research spans across predictive language processing, executive control, developmental language disorders, metacognition, cognitive consequences of multilingualism, among others.
He has studied and conducted research across different research institutes and universities in Nepal, India, Spain, and Germany.
He is also an Adjunct Faculty Member at the National Academy of Medical Sciences (NAMS), Bir Hospital, Kathmandu.
